sentences.english: That weasel is cooking you all.
That tree is writing to us.
That bird snake is writing it.
The squirrel is going to lie down.
That earth is going to talk.
This bird snake is going to talk.
This rock is going to work.
The river is going to eat him/her/it.
That coffee is going to dance.
The pinenuts are going to visit me.
The cottontail is visiting you all.
That cat will hit you all.
Coffee is talking to you all.
That food is going to sit.
The horse is going to talk.
Corn is going to talk to us.
That rice is going to sleep.
That wickiup is going to sleep.
The water is going to lie down.
This rock is going to go.
This cup is going to dance.
That water is going to fly.
